org.cmg.resp.protocol
Class AttributeRequest

java.lang.Object
  org.cmg.resp.protocol.Message
      org.cmg.resp.protocol.UnicastMessage
          org.cmg.resp.protocol.AttributeRequest

public class AttributeRequest
extends UnicastMessage

This message is sent when a component needs to obtain the values of a given set of attributes from a node.

Author:
Michele Loreti
